players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Has anyone seen Diana? I think we should discuss who we believe might be acting suspiciously today."
Charlie: "Bob, I want to address your comment about discussing suspicious behavior. I investigated you last night and found out that you are the mafioso."
You: "Charlie, if you truly investigated Bob and found him to be the mafioso, why should we trust your claim? We need to consider the possibility that you might be misleading us."
You: "Charlie, your claim about investigating Bob seems suspicious. If you're the detective, it raises questions about why you would reveal this information in such a confrontational manner."

Bob: "Charlie, your claim about investigating me only raises more suspicion. If you are the detective, revealing my role so openly can put a target on your back. We need to think carefully about who we trust."
Charlie: "To clarify my investigation, I am the detective, and I found Bob to be the mafioso. We need to eliminate him to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
